skills: Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, SQL, Python, R, Tableau, Data Studio, Dataviz, Big Query, Google Cloud Storage, Azure, AWS, OAuth, HTTP Basic, API key, DMP, DSP, Adservers, DV 360, Airflow, Dataiku, Dataflow, Dataprep, R Shiny, Python Flask, Statistics, Machine learning
Tasks:
- Actively contributing to the expertise level and competencies of the Data & Analytics team
- Closely collaborate with the other divisions to provide comprehensive services to your clients
- Researching and developing new technical approaches to address problems efficiently
- Staying up to date on developments within the industry, sharing best practices 
- Actively contributing to Artefact's institutional knowledge  


```python
import re

def extract_tasks(text):
    """Extracts tasks from a job description text."""
    # Find all sentences starting with action verbs
    # This is a simple regex, can be improved for accuracy
    tasks = re.findall(r"^\s*(?:Actively\s+contributing|Closely\s+collaborate|Staying\s+up\s+to\s+date|Researching\s+and\s+developing|Embodying).*", text, re.MULTILINE)
    return tasks

text = """Chunk 1:
We won't give up until we make a huge dent in this industry! ### Come join us!

=======================================================

Chunk 2:
Actively contributing to the expertise level and competencies of the Data & Analytics team
Closely collaborate with the other divisions (Media & Activation, Creation, Consulting, Data Science and Data Engineer) to provide comprehensive services to your clients
Being a great tech role model
Demonstrating the skill and credibility required to ensure the success of our clients' initiatives
Researching and developing new technical approaches to address problems efficiently
Staying up to date on developments within the industry, sharing best practices and actively contributing to Artefact's institutional knowledge
Embodying Artefact's values and inspiring others to do the same
Qualifications:"""

tasks = extract_tasks(text)
print(tasks)

```
